summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: America: Imagine a World without Her Review Date: 2014/11/21 Store: John Sullivan (Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, All Lionsgate Titles Product Description: ["The new film from the creators of 2016: OBAMA'S AMERICA takes America's critics at face value and imagines a world in which she never existed. Today that notion of the essential goodness of America is under attack, replaced by another story in which theft and plunder are seen as the defining features of American history--from the theft of Native American and Mexican lands and the exploitation of African labor to a contemporary foreign policy said to be based on stealing oil and a capitalist system that robs people of their 'fair share.' Gerald Molen, the Academy Award-winning producer of SCHINDLER'S LIST, Dinesh D'Souza, the New York Times best-selling author and creator of 2016, and director John Sullivan invite you on a journey of discovery that will bring you face-to-face with America's most compelling contemporary critics along with the heroes who built America, in the times in which they lived, bled, and sacrificed in order to build a great nation. You'll be there as Christopher C"] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '082401', 'Director': 'John Sullivan', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 45 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 28, 2014', 'Producers': 'Gerald Molen', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Important video and TRUTH for our time. Makes ya proud. Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Last Airbender Review Date: 2015/02/24 Store: Noah Ringer (Actor), Nicola Peltz (Actor), M. Night Shyamalan (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['Experience the thrilling live-action adventure based on the hit Nickelodeon series', 'Avatar: The Last Airbender', '. Join Aang, an extraordinary boy with incredible “bending” powers, as he journeys through an exotic land filled with magical creatures and powerful friends. As the Avatar, he is the only one who can end the age-old conflict between the four nations: Air, Water, Earth and Fire. An inspirational journey,', 'The Last Airbender', 'is exciting entertainment for the entire family!'] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'M. Night Shyamalan', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '1 hour and 43 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 16, 2010', 'Actors': 'Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Dev Patel, Jackson Rathbone, Shaun Toub', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: Addicting storyline. Great adaptation from the TV series. Hard to take an entire season and condense it into 2 hours. They hit all the high points and we are looking forward to the rest of the trilogy and hope it is produced. Amazing scenery. Great acting. That ice castle...I mean WOW. The special effects are incredible. Highly recommend. Review Title: Great Movie....My family loved it. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Collected Works of Hayao Miyazaki (Amazon Exclusive) Review Date: 2016/02/26 Store: Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['Amazon.com', 'Item Weight: 1.60 Lb.'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.86 x 7.64 x 2.24 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Release date': 'November 17, 2015', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Studios', 'Number of discs': '12'} Review Text: An awesome collection. My children have most of these in a hodge podge of places. This set has them all in one place and a few selection we did not have. Beautiful. Nice addition to our Studio Ghibli collection.. Review Title: WOW! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie [Special Edition] Review Date: 2016/02/26 Store: Steve Blum (Actor), Beau Billingslea (Actor), Shinichiro Watanabe (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Anime Product Description: ['Mars. Days before Halloween 2071. Villains blow up a tanker truck on Highway One, releasing a deadly virus that kills hundreds. Fearing a bigger, even more devastating biochemical attack, an astronomical reward is offered for the arrest and capture of the person behind the destruction. On the spaceship "Bebop," Spike Spiegel and his crew of bounty hunters (Jet Black, Faye Valentine, Ed and Ein) are bored and short of cash. But with the news of the reward everything changes. Based on the wildly popular TV series, Cowboy Bebop, the big-screen smash COWBOY BEBOP: THE MOVIE pits Spike and Co. against their deadliest adversary ever. Featuring stunning, state-of-the-art animation, this action-packed sci-fi adventure builds to a breath-taking, nail-biting climax, guaranteed to keep you hanging on the edge of your seat.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Anime & Manga', 'Format': 'Dolby, Special Edition, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Beau Billingslea, Shinichiro Watanabe, Steve Blum', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '6857', 'Director': 'Shinichiro Watanabe', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, Special Edition, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 7, 2010', 'Actors': 'Steve Blum, Beau Billingslea', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Image Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: If you are into the BeBop series...this is a great movie. I had not watched the series, but my teens liked it. I watched the movie and enjoyed it without having the background. Nice story line. Review Title: this is a great movie. I had not watched the series Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/02/18 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Zhao Xiaoding', 'Anthony LaMolinara'], 'Producers': ['Chen Gao', 'Sa Zhilei'], 'Starring': ['Liu Yifei', 'Yang Yang', 'Chun Li'], 'Studio': ['Well Go USA Entertainment']} Review Text: I enjoy the Chinese stories. I had watched the SERIAL VERSION FIRST (Enduring Love all 63 chapters...three times.) and wanted more. YANG YANG is a favorite actor. Check out "Love 020" on NETFLIX TOO. Really addicting. iT CANNOT compare to the extended version..but shared with my daughter...she is now watching the extended version. Review Title: I LIKED IT. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/04/10 Average Rating: 4.3 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Hajime Kamegaki']} Review Text: What a thrill to have more Miaka and Taka!!! Amazing addition to the original. Didn't see it when broadcast, but happy to find these additional chapters. Watch it after watching Season 1 Original....you won't be sorry! OK, gotta search for chapter 10....oh oh Review Title: AWESOME!!! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/07/17 Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Zhang Xiaozheng'], 'Starring': ['Chen Qiaoen', 'Chen Xiao']} Review Text: The index is missing chapters...I let it play the last chapter and up popped NEXT episode. I clicked on it before it went back to INDEX and more chapters will play. I am on Chapter 44 and still going. Not sure how many there are. Review Title: After Episode 34....let it play Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Song of Phoenix Review Date: 2019/07/18 Product Description: ['Qu Yuan, a Chinese poet and minister who is born into a good family during the Warring States Era, falls in love with a slave, Mo Chou Nu. However, their relationship is extremely prohibited due to their different status and identity. To get together, they not only face numerous obstacles but also get entangled in palace politics. And Qu Yuan is planning to save his county due to his patriotism.'] Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['中文（简体）'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Chang Hsiao-Cheng'], 'Starring': ['Ma Ke', 'Viann Zhang', 'Qiao Zhenyu']} Review Text: REALLY WANT TO SEE THIS SERIES. AMAZON NEEDS A VIDEO HELP SECTION PLEASE. Review Title: INDEXING ISSUE...CAN ONLY ACCESS 4 EPISODES Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/08/11 Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Yang Xiaoming'], 'Starring': ['Wang Likun', 'Luo Jin', 'Deng Lun']} Review Text: What a great epic. So encompassing and interesting. I am so involved with this culture and the history, legends and life are so wonderfully depicted. Great job. thanks Amazon for putting out these great works. Review Title: Ten more chapters!!! YAY!!! Hopefully the next 15 are on the way. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/09/02 Average Rating: 4.5 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Li Dachao'], 'Starring': ['Wu Jinyan', 'Nie Yuan', 'Mao Zijun']} Review Text: Very well done. Love the historical dramas from the dynasties. So interesting, beautiful, mesmerizing, and addictive.

This had the best transcripts of all I have seen. BUT they did not transcribe the last summary page. Please fix that. It probably ties it all together and says what happened. Review Title: Best Subtitles and transcripts.....except final screen summary. Please translate. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/10/09 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Hou Shu-pei', 'Lan Zhiwei'], 'Starring': ['Ady An', 'Hanson Ying', 'Hu Bing Qing'], 'Studio': ['AsianCrush']} Review Text: Intense, emotional, saga, love, hate, war and years of drama. Costuming and battle scenes so well done. A little tedious at high 30 chapters but gets good again. Re-watched beginning and ending dozen chapters several times. Sad Saga...but worth the watch. Review Title: Really enoyed it Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/11/17 Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Zhang Li'], 'Starring': ['Yang Yang', 'Zhang Tianai', 'Wu Zun'], 'Studio': ['NewTV']} Review Text: Initial portrayal of lead actor as childish...was annoying. But stick it out. The story line and action are so incredible. Lots of twists and turns. Now I have the biggest crush on the lead actor...I love heroes and he is quite handsome too. Ha

The SUBTITLES WERE DONE VERY WELL....thank you so much!!!!

The costuming fight choreography and acting are all spot on. A story you will want to binge all 60 episodes and then watch the last ten again and again. So good. Highly recommend. Review Title: So worth it TO WATCH...It just gets better and better. Amazing story and actors... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Dreamworks: Spooky Stories Collection (Scared Shrekless, Shrek's Thrilling Tales & Monsters vs Aliens: Mutant Pumpkins) (DVD) [2018] Review Date: 2019/11/17 Store: Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Characters & Series, Shrek Product Description: ["Shrek's Thrilling Tales: Join Shrek, Donkey, Puss and B.O.B. as they get the fright of their lives in three spooktacular stories that will keep you howling with laughter. It’s a Shrektastic Halloween treat that’s ogre-the-top fun for the whole family. Scared Shrekless: Halloween is Shrek’s favourite holiday – but instead of the usual tricks or treats, Shrek ups the ante and challenges the gang to spend the night telling scary stories. The last one to be scared Shrekless wins Monsters vs Aliens: Susan, B.O.B., The Missing Link and Dr. Cockroach, Ph.D., are back as special operatives dispatched to investigate a mysterious alien presence on Halloween. As the night unravels the innocent-looking pumpkins are revealed for what they really are - mutant aliens! Luckily the Monsters are there to smash the mutants’ wicked scheme to take over earth."] Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'PAL', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Language': 'English (Dolby Digital 5.1)', 'Studio': 'Dreamworks Animation UK'} Review Text: Could not watch it...none of my devices would play it No response from seller. Disappointing it is UK compatible ONLY and not listed in description Review Title: Not compatible with USA DVD players. Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Halloweentown 3 & 4 2-Movie Collection Review Date: 2019/11/17 Store: Debbie Reynolds (Actor), Kimberly J. Brown (Actor), Mark A.Z. Dippe (Director), David Jackson (Director) & 1 more Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Walt Disney Studios Home Entertainment, All Disney Titles Product Description: ['In Halloweentown High the third entry in the saga, teenage witch Marnie (Kimberly J. Brown) tries to help a group of kids from Halloweentown fit in at her "normal" high school, only to find herself battling a nefarious knight bent on ridding the world of all magic-users. Joey Zimmerman, Emily Roeske, Judith Hoag, and Debbie Reynolds also star. Then, In the final installment, Return to Halloweentown Marnie gets a full scholarship to the prestigious-and delightfully spooky-Witch University. Attending the school along with her brother Dylan, she soon discovers a plot to destroy Halloweentown involving the Sinister Sisters and a Cromwell family heirloom. Sara Paxton stars. 170 minutes total.'] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Director': 'Mark A.Z. Dippe, David Jackson', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Release date': 'September 10, 2019', 'Actors': 'Debbie Reynolds, Kimberly J. Brown, Judith Hoag, Michael Flynn, Joey Zimmerman', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Video', 'Country of Origin': 'USA', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: First 2 are our favs...but binge them all every Halloween. CLASSIC. Review Title: Love all 4 Halloweentown.... Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/07/04 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language'], 'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Hui Yu'], 'Starring': ['Zheng Yecheng', 'Zhao Lusi', 'Wang Mengli'], 'Studio': ['Distributor: Jetsen']} Review Text: Pop some popcorn. Grab some kleenex. Settle in for 30 complete story episodes. Love. Jealousy. War. Demons. Immortals. Who could ask for more?

Definitely great to watch with friends or solo. Recommend highly. Review Title: Just WONDERFUL Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/07/10 Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Cai Jingsheng'], 'Starring': ['Fu Xin Bo', 'Ken Chang'], 'Studio': ['Huace']} Review Text: Loved the story. Loved the characters and the inventions and gadgets. Good guys, Royalty, Demons. A few Zombies....what's not to like? You will laugh and cry.. Recommend highly. Review Title: Great Story! We really enjoyed it. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2020/07/25 Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Wei Han Dao'], 'Starring': ['He Hong Shan'], 'Studio': ['Penguin picture']} Review Text: PLEASE FIX Review Title: PLEASE RELOAD SERIES...ONLY ONE EPISODE Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/05/08 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Ching Siu-tung'], 'Starring': ['Xiao Zhan', 'Li Qin', 'Meng Meiqi'], 'Studio': ['New Classics Media']} Review Text: TRULY OUTSTANDING SPECIAL EFFECTS. DEFINITELY WANT MORE OF THIS STORY-LINE! Review Title: HOPE THIS IS A PILOT FOR A NEW SERIES Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: America: Imagine a World without Her Review Date: 2014/11/21 Store: John Sullivan (Director) Rated: NR Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Studio Specials, Lionsgate Home Entertainment, All Lionsgate Titles Product Description: ["The new film from the creators of 2016: OBAMA'S AMERICA takes America's critics at face value and imagines a world in which she never existed. Today that notion of the essential goodness of America is under attack, replaced by another story in which theft and plunder are seen as the defining features of American history--from the theft of Native American and Mexican lands and the exploitation of African labor to a contemporary foreign policy said to be based on stealing oil and a capitalist system that robs people of their 'fair share.' Gerald Molen, the Academy Award-winning producer of SCHINDLER'S LIST, Dinesh D'Souza, the New York Times best-selling author and creator of 2016, and director John Sullivan invite you on a journey of discovery that will bring you face-to-face with America's most compelling contemporary critics along with the heroes who built America, in the times in which they lived, bled, and sacrificed in order to build a great nation. You'll be there as Christopher C"] Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Audio Description': 'English', 'Item model number': '082401', 'Director': 'John Sullivan', 'Media Format': 'NTSC, Subtitled', 'Run time': '1 hour and 45 minutes', 'Release date': 'October 28, 2014', 'Producers': 'Gerald Molen', 'Studio': 'Lionsgate', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: Important video and TRUTH for our time. Makes ya proud. Review Title: Five Stars Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Last Airbender Review Date: 2015/02/24 Store: Noah Ringer (Actor), Nicola Peltz (Actor), M. Night Shyamalan (Director) & 0 more Rated: PG Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['Experience the thrilling live-action adventure based on the hit Nickelodeon series', 'Avatar: The Last Airbender', '. Join Aang, an extraordinary boy with incredible “bending” powers, as he journeys through an exotic land filled with magical creatures and powerful friends. As the Avatar, he is the only one who can end the age-old conflict between the four nations: Air, Water, Earth and Fire. An inspirational journey,', 'The Last Airbender', 'is exciting entertainment for the entire family!'] Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG (Parental Guidance Suggested)', 'Product Dimensions': '7.5 x 0.7 x 5.4 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'Director': 'M. Night Shyamalan', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Run time': '1 hour and 43 minutes', 'Release date': 'November 16, 2010', 'Actors': 'Noah Ringer, Nicola Peltz, Dev Patel, Jackson Rathbone, Shaun Toub', 'Dubbed': 'French, Spanish', 'Subtitles': 'English, French, Spanish', 'Studio': 'Paramount', 'Number of discs': '2'} Review Text: Addicting storyline. Great adaptation from the TV series. Hard to take an entire season and condense it into 2 hours. They hit all the high points and we are looking forward to the rest of the trilogy and hope it is produced. Amazing scenery. Great acting. That ice castle...I mean WOW. The special effects are incredible. Highly recommend. Review Title: Great Movie....My family loved it. Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Collected Works of Hayao Miyazaki (Amazon Exclusive) Review Date: 2016/02/26 Store: Format: Blu-ray Categories: Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies Product Description: ['Amazon.com', 'Item Weight: 1.60 Lb.'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Aspect Ratio': '1.78:1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.86 x 7.64 x 2.24 inches; 1.34 Pounds', 'Media Format': 'Blu-ray', 'Release date': 'November 17, 2015', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Walt Disney Studios', 'Number of discs': '12'} Review Text: An awesome collection. My children have most of these in a hodge podge of places. This set has them all in one place and a few selection we did not have. Beautiful. Nice addition to our Studio Ghibli collection.. Review Title: WOW! Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Cowboy Bebop: The Movie [Special Edition] Review Date: 2016/02/26 Store: Steve Blum (Actor), Beau Billingslea (Actor), Shinichiro Watanabe (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Anime Product Description: ['Mars. Days before Halloween 2071. Villains blow up a tanker truck on Highway One, releasing a deadly virus that kills hundreds. Fearing a bigger, even more devastating biochemical attack, an astronomical reward is offered for the arrest and capture of the person behind the destruction. On the spaceship "Bebop," Spike Spiegel and his crew of bounty hunters (Jet Black, Faye Valentine, Ed and Ein) are bored and short of cash. But with the news of the reward everything changes. Based on the wildly popular TV series, Cowboy Bebop, the big-screen smash COWBOY BEBOP: THE MOVIE pits Spike and Co. against their deadliest adversary ever. Featuring stunning, state-of-the-art animation, this action-packed sci-fi adventure builds to a breath-taking, nail-biting climax, guaranteed to keep you hanging on the edge of your seat.'] Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Genre': 'Anime & Manga', 'Format': 'Dolby, Special Edition, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Beau Billingslea, Shinichiro Watanabe, Steve Blum', 'Language': 'Unqualified', 'Runtime': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Aspect Ratio': '1.85:1', 'MPAA rating': 'R (Restricted)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': '6857', 'Director': 'Shinichiro Watanabe', 'Media Format': 'Dolby, Special Edition, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '1 hour and 56 minutes', 'Release date': 'December 7, 2010', 'Actors': 'Steve Blum, Beau Billingslea', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'Image Entertainment', 'Number of discs': '1'} Review Text: If you are into the BeBop series...this is a great movie. Review Title: Really enoyed it Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2019/11/17 Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['中文'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Zhang Li'], 'Starring': ['Yang Yang', 'Zhang Tianai', 'Wu Zun'], 'Studio': ['NewTV']} Review Text: Initial portrayal of lead actor as childish...was annoying. The SUBTITLES WERE DONE VERY WELL....thank you so much!!!!

The costuming fight choreography and acting are all spot on. A story you will want to binge all 60 episodes and then watch the last ten again and again. So good. Highly recommend. Review Title: So worth it TO WATCH...It just gets better and better. Amazing story and actors... raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has consistently expressed enthusiasm for various media items, citing exceptional storytelling and entertainment value. Many reviews highlight addictive plots and impressive special effects, showcasing an appreciation for high-quality productions. Family-friendly content is also prominent, with multiple mentions of enjoyment among family members. The user values insightful themes and well-executed adaptations, indicating satisfaction with the overall experience of these purchases. Many items received high ratings, reflecting a strong positive sentiment towards the quality of the films and series.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Despite a great number of positive experiences, there are notable disappointments, particularly regarding compatibility and accessibility issues. The user encountered problems where specific DVDs were not playable on their devices due to regional compatibility. Additionally, there were frustrations related to missing content or indexing issues on streaming platforms, which hindered the viewing experience. A few reviews disclosed annoyance with initial character portrayals, suggesting that some productions did not fully meet the user's expectations.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
The user's purchase history reflects a passionate engagement with media, characterized by a strong preference for quality storytelling and memorable family-friendly content. While many purchases resulted in positive experiences and high ratings, some notable negative aspects arose from technical issues and unsatisfactory character portrayals. Nonetheless, the overall impression indicates a deep appreciation for the genres explored, with a blend of excitement and frustration that captures the complex nature of modern media consumption.

target_interaction.title: Good Story....loosely based on Bible
target_interaction.text: The movie is entertaining, but would probably been more successful as an independent title.  Other than names used, little resembles the biblical account.  I did like the actors and costuming.
